[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'bum tha pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@#/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_glegs bam bcu pa/_bam po dang po/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[1b.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[1b.3\]]nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[1b.4\]]kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[1b.5\]]de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid

[\[2a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni

[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa

[\[3a\]]

[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[6a.3\]]nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[6a.4\]]pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang 
[\[6a.5\]]yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_
[\[6a.6\]]gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar 
[\[6a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dbang po rnams kyi 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams

[\[6b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[6b.7\]]bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa 
[\[7a\]]

[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid

[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i de bzhin

[\[8a.7\]]yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te/_chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/_/de 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/_khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/_zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs 
[\[8b.2\]]pas rig par bya ba/_'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/_de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/_nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/_gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/_gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba 
[\[8b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag yang 
[\[8b.4\]]dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zab 
[\[8b.5\]]pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gag pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs 
[\[8b.6\]]par byang chub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 
[\[8b.7\]]sems can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag srog zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'gro ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag gso ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag skyes bu zab pa'i phyir 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag gang zag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag shed can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag shed bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag byed pa po zab pa'i 
[\[9a.2\]]phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag tshor ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag shes pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/
[\[9a.3\]]lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'du shes zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 
[\[9a.4\]{]myig [,]mig [}]zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rna ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sna zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag lce zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_lha'i bu dag lus zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/
[\[9a.5\]]lha'i bu dag yid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sgra zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag dri zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag ro zab pa'i phyir chos 
[\[9a.6\]]'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag reg zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag chos zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir 
[\[9a.7\]]chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag lce'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i 
[\[9b.2\]]phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu 
[\[9b.3\]]dag [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir 
[\[9b.4\]]chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[9b.5\]]kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag chu'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 
[\[9b.6\]]rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag nam mkha'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di 
[\[9b.7\]]zab bo/_lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir chos 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sred pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag len pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di 
[\[10a.2\]]zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag srid pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag skye ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rga shi zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab 
[\[10a.3\]]bo/_/lha'i bu dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/
[\[10a.4\]]lha'i bu dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[10a.5\]]zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu 
[\[10a.6\]]dag don dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mtha' las 'das pa stong 
[\[10a.7\]]pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu 
[\[10b.2\]]dag dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[10b.3\]]zab ba'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag dbang po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag stobs zab 
[\[10b.4\]]pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di 
[\[10b.5\]]zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rnam par thar 
[\[10b.6\]]ba zab pa'i phyin chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zab pa'i phyir chos 
[\[10b.7\]]'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag byams pa chen po zab pa'i phyir 
[\[11a.2\]]chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_
[\[11a.3\]]lha'i bu dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag dgra bcom pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rang byang chub 
[\[11a.4\]]zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/_/lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[11a.5\]]'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_tshor ba gzung 
[\[11a.6\]]ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_'du shes gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_
[\[11a.7\]]rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du/_bstan pa ma lags/_rna ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du/_bstan pa ma lags/_sna gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lce gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lus gzung ba'i slad

[\[11b.3\]]gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_dri gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_ro gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_reg

[\[11b.5\]]pa ma lags/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_sna'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lce'i rnam par shes

[\[11b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]sna'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lus kyi 'dus te

[\[12a.4\]]ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i

[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]slad du bstan pa ma lags/_ma rig pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du

[\[12b.3\]]lags/_reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_sred pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du 
[\[12b.4\]]bstan pa ma lags/_len pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_srid pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_skye ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung 
[\[12b.5\]]ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rga shi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[12b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du 
[\[12b.7\]]ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]slad du bstan pa ma lags/_nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_phyi stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_phyi nang 
[\[13a.2\]]stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_chen po stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung 
[\[13a.3\]]ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_don dam pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_'dus byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_'dus ma 
[\[13a.4\]]byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/_mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i 
[\[13a.5\]]slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad 
[\[13a.6\]]du bstan pa ma lags/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[13a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan 
[\[13b.2\]]pa ma lags/_yang dag par spong ba rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_dbang po rnams gzung ba'i 
[\[13b.3\]]slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_stobs rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_
[\[13b.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung pa'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_bsam gtan rnams gzung 
[\[13b.5\]]ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung 
[\[13b.6\]]ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rnam par thar pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma 
[\[13b.7\]]lags/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_mngon par shes pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_ting nge 'dzin rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_
[\[14a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
[\[14a.3\]]gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_byams pa chen po gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_snying rje chen po gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan 
[\[14a.4\]]pa ma lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lan cig 
[\[14a.5\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_dgra bcom pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma 
[\[14a.6\]]lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rang byang chub gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/_rnam 
[\[14a.7\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugs so/_/bdag ni gzugs can no/_/bdag gi tshor ba'o/_/bdag gis tshor bar bya'o/_/bdag gi 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]'du shes so/_/bdag ni 'du shes can no/_/bdag gi 'du byed do/_/bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o/_/bdag gi rnam par shes par bya'o/_/bdag gis rnam par shes par bya'o/_/bdag gi [{]myig [,]mig [}]go_/bdag gis blta bar bya'o/_/bdag gi rna ba'o/_/
[\[14b.2\]]bdag gis thos par bya'o/_/bdag gi sna'o/_/bdag gis bsnam par bya'o/_/bdag gi lce'o/_/bdag gis myong par bya'o/_/bdag gi lus so/_/bdag gis reg par bya'o/_/bdag gi yid do/_/bdag ni yid can no/_/bdag gi gzugs so/_/
[\[14b.3\]]bdag ni gzugs dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag gi sgra'o/_/bdag ni nyan pa'o/_/bdag gi dri'o/_/bdag ni snom pa'o/_/bdag gi ro'o/_/bdag ni ro myong ba'o/_/bdag gi reg go/_/bdag ni reg par byed pa'o/_/bdag gi chos so/_/bdag ni chos 
[\[14b.4\]]shes pa'o/_/bdag gi [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bdag ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa can no/_/bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/bdag ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa can no/_/bdag gi sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/bdag gi sna'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[14b.5\]]can no/_/bdag gi lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/bdag ni lce'i rnam par shes pa can no/_/bdag gi lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bdag ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa can no/_/bdag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bdag ni yid kyi rnam 
[\[14b.6\]]par shes pa can no/_/bdag gi [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bdag ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa can no/_/bdag gi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bdag ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa can no/_/bdag gi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bdag ni sna'i 'dus te 
[\[14b.7\]]reg pa can no/_/bdag gi lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa can no/_/bdag gi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa can no/_/bdag gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bdag ni yid kyi 'dus 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]te reg pa can no/_/bdag gi [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bdag ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/_/bdag gi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bdag ni rna ba'i 
[\[15a.2\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/_/bdag gi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bdag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/_/bdag gi lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bdag ni lce'i 
[\[15a.3\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/_/bdag gi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/_/bdag gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/_/
[\[15a.4\]]bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tshor ba'o/_/bdag gi sa'i khams so/_/bdag ni sa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/_/bdag gi chu'i khams so/_/bdag ni chu'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/_/bdag 
[\[15a.5\]]gi [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams so/_/bdag ni [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/_bdag gi rlung gi khams so/_/bdag ni rlung gi khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/_bdag gi nam mkha'i khams so/_/bdag ni nam mkha'i khams las rnam par ma 
[\[15a.6\]]'das pa'o/_/bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams so/_/bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams las rnam par ma 'das pa'o/_/bdag gi ma rig pa'o/_/bdag ni ma rig pa can no/_/bdag gi 'du byed do/_/bdag ni 'du byed pa'o/_/
[\[15a.7\]]bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bdag ni rnam par shes par byed pa'o/_/bdag gi [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs so/_/bdag ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs can no/_/bdag gi skye mched drug go/_/bdag ni skye mched drug can no/_/bdag gi reg pa'o/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]bdag ni reg par byed pa'o/_/bdag gi tshor ba'o/_/bdag ni tshor bar byed pa'o/_/bdag gi sred pa'o/_/bdag ni sred par byed pa'o/_/bdag gi len pa'o/_/bdag ni len pa can no/_/bdag gi srid pa'o/_/bdag ni srid pa can no/_/bdag gi 
[\[15b.2\]]skye ba'o/_/bdag ni skye ba'i chos can no/_/bdag gi rga shi'o/_/bdag ni rga shi'i chos can no/_/bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[15b.3\]]pa'o/_/bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[15b.4\]]bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[15b.5\]]bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi phyi stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi phyi nang 
[\[15b.6\]]stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi chen po stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/
[\[15b.7\]]bdag gi don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis 'dus ma 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis 
[\[16a.2\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/
[\[16a.3\]]bdag gi chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong 
[\[16a.4\]]pa nyid do/_/bdag gis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[16a.5\]]la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/_/bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 
[\[16a.6\]]spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi dbang 
[\[16a.7\]]po rnams so/_/bdag gis dbang po rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi stobs rnams so/_/bdag gis stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]par bya'o/_/bdag gi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/
[\[16b.2\]]bdag gi bsam gtan rnams so/_/bdag gis bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams so/_/bdag gis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/bdag gis 
[\[16b.3\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi rnam par thar pa rnams so/_/bdag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/bdag gis mthar kyis 
[\[16b.4\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyad 
[\[16b.5\]]par bya'o/_/bdag gi mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/bdag 
[\[16b.6\]]gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams so/_/bdag gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyad par 
[\[16b.7\]]bya'o/_/bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/_/bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi byams pa chen po'o/_/bdag gis byams pa chen po la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi snying rje chen po'o/_/bdag 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]gis snying rje chen po la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gi rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/bdag ni rgyun tu 
[\[17a.2\]]zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/bdag ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/bdag ni dgra bcom 
[\[17a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi rang byang chub bo/_/bdag ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/bdag ni rnam pa thams cad 
[\[17a.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de 
[\[17a.5\]]bzhin te/_lha'i bu dag chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_'du shes gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung 
[\[17a.6\]]ba'i phyir ma yin/_'du byed gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma 
[\[17a.7\]]yin/_rna ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_sna gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_lce gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_lus gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_yid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_sgra gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_

[\[17b.3\]]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_sna'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir

[\[17b.5\]]shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma 
[\[17b.6\]]yin/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[17b.7\]]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rna ba'i 'dus te 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[18a.2\]]las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir 
[\[18a.3\]]bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_sa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_sa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_chu'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[18a.4\]]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rlung gi khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_nam mkha'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_
[\[18a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_ma rig pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_'du byed gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma

[\[18a.7\]]tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_sred pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_len pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_srid pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_skye ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rga shi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma 
[\[18b.2\]]yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_brtson 'grus 
[\[18b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma 
[\[18b.4\]]yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_phyi stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_phyi nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa 
[\[18b.5\]]ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_chen po stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_don dam pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i 
[\[18b.6\]]phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_'dus byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_

[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma 
[\[19a.2\]]yin/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa 
[\[19a.3\]]ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_dran pa nye bar 
[\[19a.4\]]gzhag pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_yang dag par spong ba rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[19a.5\]]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_dbang po rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_stobs rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma 
[\[19a.6\]]yin/_mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_bsam 
[\[19a.7\]]gtan rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rnam par thar pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/_mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rnam 
[\[19b.2\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_mngon par shes pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[19b.3\]]rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung

[\[19b.5\]]phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_snying rje chen po gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_
[\[19b.6\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma 
[\[19b.7\]]yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_dgra bcom pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rang byang chub gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gzung ba'i 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/_lha'i bu dag gang yang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir ram/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[20b\]]

[\[21a\]]

[\[21b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram/_mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i

[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]bcom pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_rang byang chub gzung ba'i phyir ram/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_lam gyi rnam bshes pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir ram/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]rkang pa rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/dbang po rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/stobs rnams bsgom par mi nus so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 
[\[23a.2\]]bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/bsam gtan rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/
[\[23a.3\]]rnam par thar ba rnams bsgom pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/mngon par 
[\[23a.4\]]shes pa rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/
[\[23a.5\]]so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/byams pa chen po bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/snying rje chen po bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus 
[\[23a.6\]]so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/rang byang chub bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/
[\[23a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa ste/_chos 'di chos gang rnams dang rjes su 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]mthun pa lags she na/_chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni 
[\[23b.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 
[\[23b.3\]]'di ni phyi stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni don dam pa stong 
[\[23b.4\]]pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni thog 
[\[23b.5\]]ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 
[\[23b.6\]]'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di 
[\[23b.7\]]ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang rjes 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni dbang po rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni stobs rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam 
[\[24a.2\]]yan lag brgyad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni bsam gtan rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni gzugs 
[\[24a.3\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni rnam par thar pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni rnam par thar ba'i sgo 
[\[24a.4\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang rjes su 
[\[24a.5\]]mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni byams 
[\[24a.6\]]pa chen po dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni snying rje chen po dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni 
[\[24a.7\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni rang byang chub dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni lam 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o/_/chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/_ci la thogs pa ma mchis she na/_gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[24b.2\]]tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/'du shes la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/'du byed la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rna ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/sna la thogs 
[\[24b.3\]]pa ma mchis so/_/lce la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/lus la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/yid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/sgra la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/dri la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/ro la thogs pa ma 
[\[24b.4\]]mchis so/_/reg la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/chos la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[24b.5\]]lce'i rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 
[\[24b.6\]]thogs pa ma mchis so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 
[\[24b.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]thogs pa ma mchis so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/sa'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[25a.2\]]chu'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rlung gi khams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/nam mkha'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/ma rig pa 
[\[25a.3\]]la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/'du byed la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/myid dang gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/skye mched drug la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/reg pa la thogs pa 
[\[25a.4\]]ma mchis so/_/tshor ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/srid pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/len pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/srid pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/skye ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rga shi la thogs pa ma 
[\[25a.5\]]mchis so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[25a.6\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/nang stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/phyi stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma 
[\[25a.7\]]mchis so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/chen po stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 
[\[25b.2\]]thogs pa ma mchis so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma 
[\[25b.3\]]mchis so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[25b.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/dbang po rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/stobs rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 
[\[25b.5\]]thogs pa ma mchis so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/bsam gtan rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la thogs 
[\[25b.6\]]pa ma mchis so/_/rnam par thar ba rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la thogs pa 
[\[25b.7\]]ma mchis so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/byams pa chen po la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/snying rje chen po la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[26a.2\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/dgra 
[\[26a.3\]]bcom pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rang byang chub la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la thogs pa ma mchis so/_/chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa 
[\[26a.4\]]nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mnyam 
[\[26a.5\]]pa nyid dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/chos 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba 
[\[26a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_tshor ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'du shes kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'du byed kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rna ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_
[\[26a.7\]]sna'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lce'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lus kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_gzugs kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sgra'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dri'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ro'i 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_reg gi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_chos kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[26b.2\]]pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus 
[\[26b.3\]]te reg pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_
[\[26b.4\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[26b.5\]]las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sa'i khams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_chu'i 
[\[26b.6\]]khams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rlung gi khams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ma rig 
[\[26b.7\]]pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'du byed kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_skye mched drug gi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_reg pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]dang /_tshor ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sred pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_len pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_srid pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_skye ba'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rga shi'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_
[\[27a.2\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_
[\[27a.3\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[27a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong 
[\[27a.5\]]pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rab bzhin stong pa nyid kyi

[\[27a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dbang po rnams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_stobs rnams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan

[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[29a.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dbang po'i rten 
[\[29a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_stobs kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[29a.4\]]rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_
[\[29a.5\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[29a.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_byams pa chen po'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[29a.7\]]ma 'dres pa'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]dang /_rang byang chub kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rten [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i slad du rten ma mchis pa'o/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod 
[\[29b.2\]]pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing 
[\[29b.3\]]ston to/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du 
[\[29b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes zer ba ni/_ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na/_gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[29b.5\]]pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa ste/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du/_gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song bas na/_thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs 
[\[29b.6\]]pa'i rjes su skyes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de'o/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[29b.7\]]de bzhin nyid de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin no/_/de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]rjes su skyes so/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de bzhin du/_gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[30a.2\]]pa'i de bzhin nyid ci la yang thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de bzhin du/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ci la yang thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig cing 
[\[30a.3\]]gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_de bzhin nyid de yang ma byas pa ste/_de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de bzhin nyid de gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su 
[\[30a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]cing gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad du 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de bzhin du 
[\[30a.5\]]rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog_/rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa dbyer [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'byed pa ma yin pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de bzhin du/_rab 'byor kyi 
[\[30a.6\]]de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'byed pa ma yin pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[30a.7\]]las gud na yod pa ma yin te/_de nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin te/_rtag tu de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor yang rnam pa gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gar yang rjes su skyes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes bya ste/_ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_de ltar byung ba ma yin pa de bzhin du/_
[\[30b.2\]]chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_de ltar byung ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_da ltar byung ba ma yin te/_de ltar na gnas 
[\[30b.3\]]brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dag 'di la 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid 
[\[30b.4\]]kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/_/da ltar 
[\[30b.5\]]byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/_/de ltar na 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs 
[\[30b.6\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gsum pa/_/
[\[30b.7\]]gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin

[\[32b\]]

[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de

[\[33b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te 
[\[33b.4\]]reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las

[\[33b.7\]]kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sa'i khams kyi 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[34a.2\]]de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis chu'i khams kyis de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[34a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]

[\[34a.5\]]kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin 
[\[34a.6\]]gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin 
[\[34a.7\]]nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[34b.2\]]de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[34b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/_

[\[35a.1\]]tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la

[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_

[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo

[\[37b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin

[\[37b.6\]]pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dbang po'i

[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]do/_/stobs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis stobs kyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na stobs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid

[\[38a.3\]]lag gi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[38a.4\]]nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa'i de
