[\[38a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin 
[\[38a.7\]]gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 
[\[38b.2\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la/_gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar ba'i de bzhin 
[\[38b.3\]]nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid de/_/de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su

[\[38b.5\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 
[\[38b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid de/_de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]to/_/rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go_/rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig_/kun tu shig shig go_/

[\[40b.3\]]de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor nas/_'di skad du bcom ldan 
[\[40b.4\]]'das de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ngo mtshar to zhes tshig tu brjod do/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste/_lha'i 
[\[40b.5\]]bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ltar na lha'i bu dag gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes/_gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/gzugs kyi/_de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid

[\[41a\]]

[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]rjes su ma skyes so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rjes su ma skyes/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus

[\[42b.7\]]te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rjes su ma skyes/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_lus kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rjes su ma skyes/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/
[\[43a.2\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/sa'i khams kyi rjes su ma skyes/_sa'i khams las gzhan gyi 
[\[43a.3\]]rjes su ma skyes so/_/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/chu'i khams kyi rjes su ma skyes/_chu'i khams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin 
[\[43a.4\]]nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi rjes su ma skyes/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[43a.5\]]las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/rlung gi khams kyi rjes su ma skyes/_rlung gi khams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/
[\[43a.6\]]nam mkha'i khams kyi rjes su ma skyes/_nam mkha'i khams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/rnam par shes pa'i

[\[47b.4\]]skyes/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[47b.5\]]kyi rjes su ma skyes/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/lan cig phyir 
[\[47b.6\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma 
[\[47b.7\]]skyes so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_dgra bcom pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/rang byang chub kyi rjes su ma skyes/_rang byang chub las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma 
[\[48a.2\]]skyes/_rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_
[\[48a.3\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 
[\[48a.4\]]rjes su ma skyes/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/_'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_'dus byas 
[\[48a.5\]]kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/_'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/_/'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/_'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma 
[\[48a.6\]]skyes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang rjes su skyes pa dang /_gang gis rjes su skyes pa dang /_gang rjes su bskyed pa dang /_gang gis rjes su bskyed pa dang /_gang rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'am/_gang gis rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[48a.7\]]chos de dag thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni zab pa ste/_de la gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_gzugs nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_gzugs kyi

[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de

[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las

[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]de la 'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_/'du byed nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la rnam par shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin 
[\[51a.2\]]nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[51a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la skye mched drug [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_skye mched drug nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[51a.4\]]par ga la 'gyur/_de la reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_reg pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_tshor ba 
[\[51a.5\]]nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs na/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la sred pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_sred pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_sred pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la len pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[51a.6\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_len pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_len pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_len pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la srid pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_srid pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_srid pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_srid pa'i de 
[\[51a.7\]]bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_skye ba'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_skye ba nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_skye ba'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la rga shi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]rga shi nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_sbyin 
[\[51b.2\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_tshul 
[\[51b.3\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_bzod 
[\[51b.4\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_/de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_
[\[51b.5\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[51b.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang 
[\[51b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la phyi stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la phyi nang 
[\[52a.2\]]stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_stong pa nyid stong 
[\[52a.3\]]pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la chen po stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[52a.4\]]chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la don dam pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[52a.5\]]na/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[52a.6\]]de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[52b.2\]]nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par 
[\[52b.3\]]ga la 'gyur/_de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la chos thams cad stong 
[\[52b.4\]]pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs na/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[52b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dngos po 
[\[53a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[53a.3\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la yang dag par spong pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[53a.4\]]yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
[\[53a.5\]]pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la dbang po rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbang po'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs te/_dbang 
[\[53a.6\]]po nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la stobs rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_stobs kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stobs nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta 
[\[53a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]'gyur/_de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de 
[\[53b.2\]]bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin 
[\[53b.3\]]nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la bsam gtan rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bsam gtan nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la tshad 
[\[53b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_

[\[53b.7\]]'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon 
[\[54a.2\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[54a.3\]]par ga la 'gyur/_de la mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mngon par shes pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la

[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]tshor ba nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 
[\[57a.2\]]tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor 
[\[57a.3\]]ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la

[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_byang chub kyi yan lag nyid 
[\[60a.2\]]kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de 
[\[60a.3\]]bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'phags pa'i 
[\[60a.4\]]bden pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la bsam gtan rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[60a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bsam gtan nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_
[\[60a.6\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[60a.7\]]'jug pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs na/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la rnam par thar pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rnam par thar pa nyid kyang 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[60b.2\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[60b.3\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_

[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]par ga la 'gyur/_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa nyid kyang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 
[\[61a.2\]]'gyur/_de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[61a.3\]]par ga la 'gyur/_de la snying rje chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/_de la rang byang chub [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[61b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rang byang chub nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_lam gyi rnam pa 
[\[61b.3\]]shes pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur/_de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rnam pa 
[\[61b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par ga la 'gyur//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po lnga pa/_
[\[61b.5\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos 
[\[61b.6\]]rnams la chos kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]rdul byed cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang /_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyam pa'i chos can drug cu ni nye bar 
[\[61b.7\]]len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya bsnyen bkur te/_thams cad du yang sbyin pa byin/_tshul khrims bsrungs/_bzod 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]pa bsgoms/_brtson 'grus brtsams/_bsam gtan bsgrubs/_shes rab bsgoms kyang /_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas/_
[\[62a.2\]]sbyin pa byin te/_'di ni sbyin pa'o/_/'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o/_/'di la sbyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims so/_/bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o/_/'di ni bzod pa'o/_/bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o/_/'di ni brtson 'grus 
[\[62a.3\]]so/_/bdag gis ni brtsam par bya'o/_/'di ni bsam gtan no/_/bdag gis ni mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/_/'di ni shes rab bo/_/bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o/_/zhes tha dad par spyod pas/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 
[\[62a.4\]]bral zhing /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong /_tshul khrims srung /_bzod pa sgom/_brtson 'grus rtsom/_bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog_/shes rab goms par byed cing /_de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyis 
[\[62a.5\]]spyod pas/_tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa ma [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma zhugs so/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma zhugs par/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob 
[\[62a.6\]]bo/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod mod kyi/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[62a.7\]]phyin pa dang bral zhing /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/_nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom du 'dra yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /_thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyis shing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur 
[\[62b.2\]]la/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom du bas kyang thabs mkhas pa la brten cing /_bla na 
[\[62b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral ba/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[62b.4\]]dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos 'ba' shig bsgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa ma thob pas/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 
[\[62b.5\]]ma bral ba rnams ni/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams la bsgom zhing /_thabs mkhas pa thob pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug cing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[62b.6\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_bya zhig la lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/_dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am/_dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'am/_dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa 'am/_dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig yod la/_
[\[62b.7\]]de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas 'dir 'ong bar 'dod la bya de la 'dab ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhig ste/_'dzam bu'i gling du gnas so snyam nas/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/_gal te bya de lam nas 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]ma la bdag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/_bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[63a.2\]]'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang ma smas ma snad par 'dzam bu'i gling du 'dug par bya'o snyam na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/_bya de 'dzam 
[\[63a.3\]]bu'i gling du ma smas ma snad par 'dug par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dzam bu'i gling du lhung nas/_smas pa 'am snad bar yang 'gyur/_'gum pa 'am/_gum pa la thug par sdug 
[\[63a.4\]]bsngal bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar lus che la 'dab ma ma mchis pa de ni/_de ltar 'gyur du gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[63a.5\]]bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims srung /_bzod pa sgom/_brtson 'grus rtsom/_bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog zhing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[63a.6\]]bya ba'i phyir de'i smon pa yang che/_de'i sems bskyed pa yang che/_yongs su 'dzin pa yang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]du zin kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[63a.7\]]ltung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan par sbyin pa byin/_tshul khrims bsrungs/_bzod pa bsgoms/_brtson 'grus brtsams/_bsam gtan 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]bsgrubs pas/_byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa 
[\[63b.2\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems shing /_'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang de bzhin 
[\[63b.3\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes/_ting nge 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes/_shes rab [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes/_rnam par grol ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes na/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes khong du ma chud pas stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[63b.4\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sgra thos nas/_de ni de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/_des de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar bzung zhing bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o/_/de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos 
[\[63b.5\]]kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba ni/_
[\[63b.6\]]de ltar 'gyur du gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing /_tshul khrims srung 
[\[63b.7\]]ba dang /_bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba ste/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin/_
[\[64a.2\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur 
[\[64a.3\]]bar rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung /_tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /_
[\[64a.4\]]bzod pa bsgrubs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /_brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /_bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /_shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa 
[\[64a.5\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[64a.6\]]dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ba dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[64a.7\]]dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems 
[\[64b.2\]]kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus byas stong pa 
[\[64b.3\]]nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[64b.4\]]stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid 
[\[64b.5\]]sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_
[\[64b.6\]]mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa dang /_
[\[64b.7\]]mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dbang po rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]sems kyis stobs rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang /_mtshan 
[\[65a.2\]]ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems 
[\[65a.3\]]kyis gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang /_
[\[65a.4\]]mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 
[\[65a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 
[\[65a.6\]]pa rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis snying rje chen po sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[65a.7\]]rnams sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]bu sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang byang chub sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[65b.2\]]dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_
[\[65b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral na/_de'i bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsom ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[65b.4\]]du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang 
[\[65b.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam/_rna ba 'am/_sna 'am/_lce 'am/_lus sam/_yid dam/_gzugs sam/_sgra 'am/_dri 'am/_ro 'am/_
[\[65b.6\]]reg gam/_chos sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus 
[\[65b.7\]]te reg pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/_sna'i 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/_sa'i khams sam/_
[\[66a.2\]]chu'i khams sam/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams sam/_rlung gi khams sam/_nam mkha'i khams sam/_rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/_ma rig pa 'am/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs sam/_skye mched drug gam/_reg 
[\[66a.3\]]pa 'am/_tshor ba 'am/_sred pa 'am/_len pa 'am/_srid pa 'am/_skye ba 'am/_rga shi 'am/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_
[\[66a.4\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas 
[\[66a.5\]]stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid 
[\[66a.6\]]stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[66a.7\]]rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa'am/_mngon par 
[\[66b.2\]]shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po'am/_snying rje chen po 
[\[66b.3\]]'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 
[\[66b.4\]]dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/_chos gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral 
[\[66b.5\]]ba de dag gi bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsom mchis par rig par bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa ci dang ci 
[\[66b.6\]]btang ba de thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste btang /_de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs pa dang /_bzod pa ci dang ci bsgrubs pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang dang gang brtsams pa dang /_bsam gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par bzhag 
[\[66b.7\]]pa dang /_shes rab gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste/_bsgoms pas/_de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]chub ni the tsom mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/_
[\[67a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bar bgyi'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la gnas te/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar 
[\[67a.3\]]bgyi'o/_/tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o/_/bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag par bgyi'o/_/shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o/_/nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/
[\[67a.4\]]phyi stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la 
[\[67a.5\]]spyad par bgyi'o/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/rang 
[\[67a.6\]]bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/
[\[67a.7\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]la spyad par bgyi'o/_/dbang po rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bgyi'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[67b.2\]]la spyad par bgyi'o/_/bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[67b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyad par bgyi'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/
[\[67b.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/snying rje chen po la spyad par 
[\[67b.5\]]bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o/_/dgra 
[\[67b.6\]]bcom pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/rang byang chub la spyad par bgyi'o/_/lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i 
[\[67b.7\]]lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid la/_chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_lha'i bu dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[68a.2\]]byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o/_/lha'i bu dag ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_don dam par na gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/_
[\[68a.3\]]gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang ma [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu dag chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[68a.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o zhes gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'chal ba dang /_bdag sems pa ltar na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[68a.5\]]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]dka'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/_gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs 
[\[68a.6\]]par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/_gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma mchis te/_chos thams cad ni stong pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[68a.7\]]ba dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/_chos gang 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'am/_yongs su 'grib par bgyi 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ba'i slad du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/_tshul khrims bsrung ba 'am/_bzod pa bsgom pa 'am/_brtson 'grus brtsam pa 'am/_bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa 'am/_shes rab bsgom pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[68b.2\]]bsgom pa 'am/_phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 
[\[68b.3\]]'am/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_rang gi 
[\[68b.4\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[68b.5\]]rnams bsgom pa 'am/_yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa 'am/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'am/_dbang po rnams bsgom pa'am/_stobs rnams bsgom pa'am/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'am/_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[68b.6\]]yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/_bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa 'am/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa rnams 
[\[68b.7\]]bsgom pa 'am/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnam pas bsgom pa 'am/_ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bsgom pa 'am/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/_byams pa chen 
[\[69a.2\]]po bsgom pa 'am/_snying rje chen po bsgom pa 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/_dgra bcom pa 
[\[69a.3\]]nyid bsgom pa 'am/_rang byang chub bsgom pa 'am/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du bslab pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis pa ste/_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[69a.4\]]'tshang rgya ba 'am/_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyang stong pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[69a.5\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'du byed ni 
[\[69a.6\]]'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sna ni sna'i rang bzhin 
[\[69a.7\]]gyis stong ngo /_/lce ni lce'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dri ni dri'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/ro ni ro'i rang bzhin 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]gyis stong ngo /_/reg ni reg gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[69b.2\]]gyis stong ngo /_/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid 
[\[69b.3\]]kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sna'i 'dus te reg 
[\[69b.4\]]pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te 
[\[69b.5\]]reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 
[\[69b.6\]]rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis 
[\[69b.7\]]stong ngo /_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang 
[\[70a.2\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'du byed ni 
[\[70a.3\]]'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/reg 
[\[70a.4\]]pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/skye ba 
[\[70a.5\]]ni skye ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[70a.6\]]gyis stong ngo /_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam 
[\[70a.7\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/
[\[70b.2\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mtha' 
[\[70b.3\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[70b.4\]]rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 
[\[70b.5\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[70b.6\]]kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/yang dag par spong ba 
[\[70b.7\]]rnams ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stobs rnams ni stobs kyi rang bzhin 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]gyis stong ngo /_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/'phags 
[\[71a.2\]]pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[71a.3\]]ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang 
[\[71a.4\]]bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon 
[\[71a.5\]]par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[71a.6\]]kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so sa yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/
[\[71a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/
[\[71b.2\]]lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di 
[\[71b.3\]]skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' ni 'di snyam 
[\[71b.4\]]du bdag ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'di snyam du bdag gis/_bla na 
[\[71b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/_'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[71b.6\]]po ni chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos par byed 
[\[71b.7\]]kyang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ste/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ni dka' ba ste/_mngon par 
[\[72a.2\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ba ma yin par shes so/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[72a.3\]]rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci tshor ba bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci 'du shes bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[72a.4\]]byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci 'du byed bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_
[\[72a.5\]]'o na ci rnam par shes pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[72a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci rna ba bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras 
[\[72a.7\]]pa'o na ci sna bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci lce bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci lus bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci yid bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog 
[\[72b.2\]]gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma 
[\[72b.3\]]yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci sgra bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci dri bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_
[\[72b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci ro bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci reg bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[72b.5\]]chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci chos bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[72b.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[72b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci sna'i rnam par shes pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na ci lce'i rnam par shes pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci lus kyi rnam par shes pa bla na 
[\[73a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa'o na ci yid kyi rnam par shes pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang 
[\[73a.3\]]ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/

[\[81b.7\]]pa'i chos de lta bu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]sam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa 'o na gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[82a\]]

[\[91a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[91a.3\]]las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[91a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 
[\[91a.5\]]ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_ting nge 'dzin kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[91a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin

[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

[\[91b.4\]]chos de lta bu yod dam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[91b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[91b.7\]]ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin nyid bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_chos nyid bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de

[\[92a.7\]]no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_chos nyid las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_chos kyi dbyings las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/

[\[92b.4\]]yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/
[\[92b.5\]]smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings las gud na gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/
