[\[92b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gsum de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]gsum po de dag gi/_/byang chub rnam par dgod par yang mi 'gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'dis/_byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa ltar na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[93a.2\]]po ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu 
[\[93a.3\]]yang 'dod dam/_gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di la dri dgos so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'dod dam/_
[\[93a.4\]]rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gsum du 'dod dam/_smras pa tshe dang 
[\[93a.5\]]ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' gsum du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]sam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyu gcig gam/_rgyu 
[\[93a.6\]]gnyis sam/_rgyu gsum gyis de bzhin nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]sam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' gcig yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_smras pa tshe dang ldan 
[\[93a.7\]]pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa de ltar bden pa'i tshul bzhin du chos de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_ci las tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni rang sangs 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o/_/zhes bya bar sems par gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[93b.2\]]par rab tu phye ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jum zhing 'gong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]la yid la 'gyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 
[\[93b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir/_khyod kyis tshig brjod pa 
[\[93b.4\]]legs par spobs so/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag [{]myed [,]med [}]par rab tu phye ba la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jum zhing 'gong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]la 
[\[93b.5\]]yid la 'gyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93b.6\]]de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[93b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po de 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'byung bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ji ltar gnas par bgyi/_
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid du gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/

[\[94a.3\]]sems kyis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ste/_brlang ba'i sems kyis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la nga rgyal [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la g.yo [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems bskyed par bya 
[\[94a.4\]]ste/_gnod pa'i sems bskyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems kyis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ste/_gnod pa'i sems kyis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la khong khro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/_khong 
[\[94a.5\]]khro ba'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]bskyed do/_/sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i sems bskyed par bya ste/_'tshe ba'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]bskyed do/_/sems can thams cad la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'tshe ba'i sems kyis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ste/_'tshe ba'i sems kyis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/
[\[94a.6\]]sems can thams cad la ma'i sems dang /_pha'i sems dang /_phu nu'i sems dang /_sring mo'i sems dang /_bu dang bu mo'i sems dang grogs po dang /_mdza' bshes kyi sems dang /_gnyen pa dang rus gcig pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can thams 
[\[94a.7\]]cad la ma dang /_pha'i sems dang /_phu nu dang /_sring mo'i sems dang /_bu dang bu mo'i sems dang /_grogs po dang /_mdza' bshes kyi sems dang /_gnyen pa dang /_rus gcig pa'i sems kyis [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spang 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]bar bya/_gzhan yang srog gcod pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang 
[\[94b.2\]]ma byin par len pa spong bar bya/_gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_/gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun 
[\[94b.3\]]pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spang bar bya/_gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_
[\[94b.4\]]gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spang bar bya/_gzhan yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba 
[\[94b.5\]]spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang gis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang phra ma spang bar bya/_gzhan yang phra ma spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_phra ma spong ba'i 
[\[94b.6\]]legs par brjod par bya/_gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang zhes gcod pa spang bar bya/_gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_zhe gcod pa spong ba'i 
[\[94b.7\]]legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang tshig kyal pa spang bar bya/_gzhan yang tshig kyal ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_tshig 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]kyal ba spong ba'i legs par brjod par bya/_gzhan gang gis tshig kyal pa spangs pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang chags sems spang bar bya/_gzhan yang chags 
[\[95a.2\]]sems spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang gnod sems spang bar 
[\[95a.3\]]bya/_gzhan yang gnod sems spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa/_de dag gi legs pa brjod cing /_mthun pas dga' 
[\[95a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spang bar bya/_gzhan yang log par lta ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs 
[\[95a.5\]]pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[95a.6\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_bdag gis kyang bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par gzhag par bya/_gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms 
[\[95a.7\]]par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya/_
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 
[\[95b.2\]]mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya/_gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa 
[\[95b.3\]]brjod par bya/_gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag par bya/_gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[95b.4\]]pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste/_de ltar byang 
[\[95b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang byams pa la mnyam par gzhag par 
[\[95b.6\]]bya/_gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_byams pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang snying rje la

[\[96a.1\]]gis kyang dga' ba la mnyam par gzhag par bya/_gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_dga' ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing 
[\[96a.2\]]mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang btang snyoms la mnyam par gzhag par bya/_gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par bskul bar bar bya/_btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod par bya/_gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par

[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas

[\[97b\]]

[\[98a.1\]]pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mnyam par

[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang dbang po lnga bsgom par bya/_gzhan yang dbang po lnga

[\[99b\]]

[\[100a.1\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsgom par bya/_gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_rnam

[\[100b.7\]]par bya/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la lugs dang lugs ma yin pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya/_gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[101a.2\]]'byung ba lugs dang lugs ma yin pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lugs dang lugs ma yin pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang rten cing 
[\[101a.3\]]'brel bar 'byung ba lugs dang lugs ma yin pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[101a.4\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya/_kun 'byung ba rab tu spang bar bya/_'gog pa mngon tu bya/_lam bsgom par bya/_gzhan yang 
[\[101a.5\]]sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_kun 'byung ba rab tu spang ba dang /_'gog pa mngon tu bya ba dang /_lam bsgom pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba rab tu spong ba dang /_'gog pa 
[\[101a.6\]]mngon tu byed pa dang /_lam sgom pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par byed pa dang /_kun 'byung ba rab tu spong ba dang /_'gog pa mngon tu byed pa dang /_lam sgom pa de dag gi legs pa 
[\[101a.7\]]brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir/_shes pa bskyed de/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya/_gzhan yang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon tu 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon tu byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' 
[\[101b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/gzhan yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon tu bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_
[\[101b.3\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang phyir 
[\[101b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya/_gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon 
[\[101b.5\]]du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes 
[\[101b.6\]]pa bskyed de/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya/_gzhan yang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon tu bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang 
[\[101b.7\]]dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang rang byang chub shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de/_rang byang chub shes pa mngon tu bya bas yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]mngon tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya/_gzhan yang rang byang chub shes pa mngon tu bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_rang byang chub shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang rang byang chub shes pa mngon du 
[\[102a.2\]]byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po brgyad pa/_/bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug 
[\[102a.3\]]par bya/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 
[\[102a.4\]]'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'dod pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[102a.5\]]bdag gis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bya/_gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang sems can 
[\[102a.6\]]rnams yongs su smyin par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyar bar bya/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_
[\[102a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]shes pa bskyed par bya/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_mngon par shes pa bskyed pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon 
[\[102b.2\]]par shes pa skyed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par bya/_gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la yang dag par bskul bar 
[\[102b.3\]]bya/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes skyed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang bag chags 
[\[102b.4\]]kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya/_gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang 
[\[102b.5\]]ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[102b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'dod pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su gzung bar bya/_gzhan yang tshe phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par 
[\[102b.7\]]bskul bar bya/_tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/_sems can gzhan gang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang dam pa'i chos gnas 
[\[103a\]]

[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]po des/_sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang gzugs yongs su ma bzung /_tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /_'du shes yongs su ma bzung /_'du byed yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs 
[\[105a.2\]]su ma bzung /_rna ba yongs su ma bzung /_sna yongs su ma bzung /_lce yongs su ma bzung /_lus yongs su ma bzung /_yid yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/gzugs yongs su ma bzung /_sgra yongs su ma bzung /_dri yongs su ma bzung /_ro yongs 
[\[105a.3\]]su ma bzung /_reg yongs su ma bzung /_chos yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /_sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /_lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 
[\[105a.4\]]bzung /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[105a.5\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[105a.6\]]kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /_yid kyi 
[\[105a.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung /_chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung /_me'i khams yongs su ma bzung /_rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung /_nam mkha'i khams yongs 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]su ma bzung /_rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung /_'du byed yongs su ma bzung /_rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung /_skye mched drug 
[\[105b.2\]]yongs su ma bzung /_reg pa yongs su ma bzung /_tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /_sred pa yongs su ma bzung /_len pa yongs su ma bzung /_srid pa yongs su ma bzung /_skye ba yongs su ma bzung /_rga shi yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/sbyin 
[\[105b.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[105b.4\]]yongs su ma bzung /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[105b.5\]]chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_
[\[105b.6\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[105b.7\]]ma bzung /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/dran pa nye bar

[\[106a.2\]]bzung /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma bzung /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /_bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma bzung /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa

[\[109b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' nyis stong gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_
[\[109b.2\]]le'u sum cu brgyad do//_//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[109b.3\]]po'i rnam pa ni gang lags/_tshul ni gang lags/_mtshan ma ni gang lags/_ji ltar bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom

[\[109b.6\]]ltar zhugs pa ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du thos na sa de las 'das te/_de dag de bzhin nyid la re re dang /_gnyis ka dang /_gnyis ka ma yin par the tsom za ba gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ni byung rgyal du smra ba ma yin te/_don dang ldan par smra'i/_don dang 
[\[109b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan par smra ba ma yin/_gzhan gyis byas pa dang /_ma byas pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]lta zhing legs par brjod pa tshol ba yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang /_tshul gang dang /_mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bgyi/_/bcom ldan 
[\[110a.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rnam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa tshul [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rnam pa ma mchis pa/_tshul ma mchis pa/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags na/_
[\[110a.3\]]chos gang rnams las slar ldog pa'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa zhes bstan pa lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzugs 
[\[110a.4\]]las phyir ldog pa/_tshor ba las phyir ldog pa/_'du shes las phyir ldog pa/_'du byed las phyir ldog pa/_rnam par shes pa las phyir ldog pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]las phyir ldog pa/_rna ba las phyir ldog pa/_sna las phyir ldog pa/_lce las phyir ldog pa/_lus 
[\[110a.5\]]las phyir ldog pa/_yid las phyir ldog pa/_gzugs las phyir ldog pa/_sgra las phyir ldog pa/_dri las phyir ldog pa/_ro las phyir ldog pa/_reg las phyir ldog pa/_chos las phyir ldog pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa las phyir ldog pa/_rna 
[\[110a.6\]]ba'i rnam par shes pa las phyir ldog pa/_sna'i rnam par shes pa las phyir ldog pa/_lce'i rnam par shes pa las phyir ldog pa/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa las phyir ldog pa/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa las phyir ldog pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 
[\[110a.7\]]'dus te reg pa las phyir ldog pa/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir ldog pa/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir ldog pa/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las phyir ldog pa/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las phyir ldog pa/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]las phyir ldog pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las phyir ldog pa/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las phyir ldog pa/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las phyir ldog pa/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[110b.2\]]las phyir ldog pa/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las phyir ldog pa/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las phyir ldog pa/_sa'i khams las phyir ldog pa/_chu'i khams las phyir ldog pa/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams las phyir ldog pa/_
[\[110b.3\]]rlung gi khams las phyir ldog pa/_nam mkha'i khams las phyir ldog pa/_rnam par shes pa'i khams las phyir ldog pa/_ma rig pa las phyir ldog pa/_'du byed las phyir ldog pa/_rnam par shes pa las phyir ldog pa/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs las 
[\[110b.4\]]phyir ldog pa/_skye mched drug las phyir ldog pa/_reg pa las phyir ldog pa/_tshor ba las phyir ldog pa/_sred pa las phyir ldog pa/_len pa las phyir ldog pa/_srid pa las phyir ldog pa/_skye ba las phyir ldog pa/_rga shi las phyir ldog pa/_sbyin 
[\[110b.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog pa/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog pa/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog pa/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog pa/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog pa/_
[\[110b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog pa/_nang stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_phyi stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_phyi nang stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_chen po stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_don 
[\[110b.7\]]dam pa stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_'dus byas stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_dngos 
[\[111a.2\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las phyir ldog pa/_yang dag par spong ba rnams las phyir ldog pa/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[111a.3\]]gyi rkang pa rnams las phyir ldog pa/_dbang po rnams las phyir ldog pa/_stobs rnams las phyir ldog pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las phyir ldog pa/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las phyir ldog pa/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

[\[111a.7\]]ldog pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad las phyir ldog pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las phyir ldog pa/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las phyir ldog pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa de

[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/

[\[114b.3\]]pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid

[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]po'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i

[\[115a.3\]]chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gang la byang chub sems

[\[115a.6\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ni shes par bya ba shes pa'o/_/blta bar bya ba mthong ba'o/_/yang dag par lta ba gdags pa 'dogs so zhes 'di las phyi rol pa'i 
[\[115a.7\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gzhan dag gi ngor [{]myi [,]mi [}]lta ste/_de ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]cing the tsom [{]myi [,]mi [}]za'o/_/tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]snyems/_lta ba ngan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung /_bkra shis dang ltas kyis gtsang mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dogs te/_lha gzhan 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]la phyag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'tshal zhing /_me tog gam/_phreng ba 'am/_spos sam/_byug pa'am/_phye ma 'am/_gos sam/_gdugs sam/_rgyal mtshan nam/_ba dan dag de la sbyin cing /_bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems te rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag

[\[115b.3\]]gi skye gnas su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_lha tshe ring po'i nang du [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_gang na skye bo glen zhing lkug pa dge ba'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod pa'i nang du [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_yul mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo ma rungs pa dang /_kla klo'i nang du [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_
[\[115b.4\]]log par lta ba'i rigs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra [{]myi [,]mi [}]grag pa der [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ste/_de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]khom pa brgyad po 'di dag gi nang du [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye zhing /_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]du 'gyur ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin te/_rab 
[\[115b.5\]]'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[115b.6\]]dpa' chen po ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung zhing spyod de/_bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs shing /_gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa 
[\[115b.7\]]yin/_gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs shing /_gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_ma byin 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]par len pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs shing /_
[\[116a.2\]]gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod 
[\[116a.3\]]cing mthun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs shing /_gzhan yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa de 
[\[116a.4\]]dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang phra ma spangs shing /_gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_phra ma spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi 
[\[116a.5\]]legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa spangs shing /_gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_zhe gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa spangs pa 
[\[116a.6\]]de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang tshig kyal pa smra ba spangs shing /_gzhan yang tshig kyal pa smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_tshig kyal pa smra ba spang ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan 
[\[116a.7\]]gang gis tshig kyal pa smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang chags sems spangs shing /_gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_chags sems spong ba'i 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs shing /_gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/_
[\[116b.2\]]gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin/_bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs shing /_gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang 
[\[116b.3\]]dag par skul ba yin/_log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa rjod pa yin/_gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' ba yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[116b.4\]]de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 
[\[116b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_sad pa na lta ci smos te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[116b.6\]]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_nam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ngo /_/nam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/_
[\[116b.7\]]sems can thams cad kyi phyir tshul khrims de srung bar byed do/_/nam bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir bzod pa de sgom par byed do/_/nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir brtson 'grus de rtsom par byed do/_/nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir bsam gtan de la mnyam par gzhog go/_/nam 
[\[117a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir shes rab de sgom par byed de/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[117a.3\]]chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_
[\[117a.4\]]gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i chos de dag chos kyi sbyin pa bya ba'i don du kun chub par byas nas/_de chos 
[\[117a.5\]]kyi sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_'di snyam du chos kyi sbyin pa 'dis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bsams nas/_des chos kyi sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla 
[\[117a.6\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o//_//
[\[117a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po dgu pa/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos zab mo la nem nur [{]myed[,]med[}]/_the tsom [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[117b.1\]]yid gnyis [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo la nem nur ma mchis/_the tsom ma mchis/_yid gnyis ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das

[\[117b.3\]]gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam/_rna ba 'am/_sna 'am/_lce 'am/_lus sam/_yid dam/_gzugs sam/_sgra 'am/_dri 'am/_ro 'am/_reg gam/_chos sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi

[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]'am/_sred pa 'am/_len pa 'am/_srid pa 'am/_skye ba 'am/_rga shi 'am/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[118a.2\]]phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong

[\[118a.5\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[118a.6\]]sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_stong pa nyid dam/_
[\[118a.7\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang dag 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom 
[\[118b.2\]]pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan 
[\[118b.3\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_lus kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/_ngag gi las 'jam pa 
[\[118b.4\]]dang ldan pa yin/_yid kyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[118b.5\]]yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/_byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de 
[\[118b.6\]]dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste/_'dod pa la mos pa 
[\[118b.7\]]dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tsom gyi sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dang lhan cig tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/_bag la nyal ba thams cad du thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_
[\[119a.2\]]rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro 
[\[119a.3\]]zhing 'ong yang nor pa'i sems kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro/_nor pa'i sems kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ste/_de 'gro ba 'am 'ong na yang dran pa nye bar gzhag cing 'gro/_dran pa nye bar gzhag cing 'ong ste/_de dran bzhin du 'gro/_dran bzhin du 'ong /_dran bzhin du 'chag_/dran 
[\[119a.4\]]bzhin du sdod/_dran bzhin du 'dug_/dran bzhin du nyal te/_de 'phral la sa las rkang pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'deg_/'phral la sa las rkang pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog ste/_dran bzhin du rkang pa 'deg_/dran bzhin du rkang pa 'jog cing /_de sa'i phyogs mthong bzhin 
[\[119a.5\]]du 'gro ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[119a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gos kyi tshags la smad du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_rab 'byor phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan te/_gtsang zhing dri nga ba [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_rdul dang dri ma dang bral zhing 
[\[119a.7\]]nad nyung ba yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang myir gyur pa rnams kyi lus 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgya cu lus de nyid la za ba yod pa de dag kyang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[119b.2\]]de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[119b.3\]]chen po de'i lus la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgya cu po de dag [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[119b.4\]]po lus yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/ngag yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/sems yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang 
[\[119b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[119b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus yongs su dag pa lags/_ngag yongs su dag pa lags/_sems yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[119b.7\]]dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi lus dang /_ngag dang sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]drang ba dang /_lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gya gyu yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/_de yang de lta de ltar lus kyi legs 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]par spyad pa rnam gsum spyod do/_/ngag gis legs par spyad pa rnam bzhi spyod do/_/yid kyis legs par spyad pa rnam gsum spyod de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang /_ngag dang 
[\[120a.2\]]sems yongs su dag pa'o/_/de lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag pa des/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[120a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par 
[\[120a.4\]]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa ma yin/_bsod snyoms lhur len pa ma yin/_phyag dar 
[\[120a.5\]]khrod pa lhur len pa ma yin/_stan gcig pa lhur len pa ma yin/_bsod snyoms phyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]len pa lhur len pa ma yin/_ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms lhur len pa ma yin/_dgon pa lhur len pa ma yin/_shing drung lhur len pa ma yin/_
[\[120a.6\]]bla gab [{]myed [,]med [}]pa lhur len pa ma yin/_dur khrod lhur len pa ma yin/_cog bu lhur len pa ma yin/_gnas ji bzhin lhur len pa ma yin/_chos gos gsum pa lhur len pa ma yin zhing /_de sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyang /_
[\[120a.7\]]yang dag par blangs te spyod do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ser sna'i sems skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'khrug pa'i sems skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/le lo'i sems skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mnyam par ma bzhag 
[\[120b.2\]]pa'i sems skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shes rab 'chal pa'i sems skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phrag dog gi sems skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[120b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa ni blo brtan pa yin/_blo zab pa yin/_gus par gzhan la chos nyan pa yin/_gzhan las chos gang 
[\[120b.4\]]ci thos kyang /_de thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par sgrub pa yin/_'jig rten pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/_chos nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub cing /_chos 
[\[120b.5\]]gang chos kyi dbyings dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byor pa de lta bu gang yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_de thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'byor pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba yin te/_rab 'byor de dag ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub 
[\[120b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la gal te phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bdud sdig to can gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad 
[\[120b.7\]]mngon du sprul nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po de re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]bye ba phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po/_byang chub sems dpa' bye 
[\[121a.2\]]ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po bsreg cing btso ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]bzad par sdug bsngal ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_tsha ba'i tshor ba myong bar mngon du sprul nas bstan te/_byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[121a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa yin te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po 'dir skyes so/_/khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par lung bstan pa ni/_sems can dmyal 
[\[121a.4\]]ba par lung bstan te/_da dung yang khyod kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di thongs shig dang /_khyod sems can dmyal bar skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_de ltar byas na khyod mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes zer yang /_rab 'byor gal te byang 
[\[121a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'khrug cing nem nur [{]myed [,]med [}]the tsom [{]myed [,]med [}]na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[121a.6\]]de dag gis kyang lung bstan par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs brgyad pa ste/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[121a.7\]]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmyal ba ba'am/_byol song gi skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge sbyong gi cha byad du 'ongs te/_
[\[121b.2\]]'di skad du gang khyod kyis sngon 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spyad par bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[121b.3\]]sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[121b.4\]]sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis stong 
[\[121b.5\]]pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[121b.6\]]sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[121b.7\]]su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]'di ltar bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su 
[\[122a.2\]]sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs 
[\[122a.3\]]su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis dbang po rnams yongs su sbyang bar 
[\[122a.4\]]bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/
[\[122a.5\]]'di ltar bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis bsam gtan rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag 
[\[122a.6\]]gis gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs 
[\[122a.7\]]su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis mngon par 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]shes pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[122b.2\]]rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis byams pa chen po yongs 
[\[122b.3\]]su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis snying rje chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su 
[\[122b.4\]]sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[122b.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes nas thos par gyur pa de shogs shig_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan 
[\[122b.6\]]thos dang bcas pa rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba de dag kyang so sor shogs shig thongs shig_/gang khyod kyis 
[\[122b.7\]]thos pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin te/_de ni rang bzor byas pa'o/_/gang ngas bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o/_/
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]zhes zer la/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khrug cing nem nur byed la/_the tsom za na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[123a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis lung ma bstan par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni ma nges pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa ma yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[123a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrug cing /_nem nur [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed/_the tsom [{]myi [,]mi [}]za la/_chos nyid la rten cing mngon par 'du ma byas pa dang /_ma skyes pa la rten te/_gzhan la yid ches par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro zhing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi 
[\[123a.4\]]dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan 
[\[123a.5\]]gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/nang stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/phyi stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan 
[\[123a.6\]]gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/chen po stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/mtha' las 'das 
[\[123a.7\]]pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/chos thams cad stong pa 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi 
[\[123b.2\]]dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gzhan 
[\[123b.3\]]gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/dbang po rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/stobs rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/
[\[123b.4\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/bsam gtan rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/rnam 
[\[123b.5\]]par thar pa brgyad la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/
[\[123b.6\]]mngon par shes pa rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 
[\[123b.7\]]pa bzhi la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/byams pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/snying rje chen po la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/dgra bcom 
[\[124a.2\]]pa nyid la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/rang byang chub la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog pa dang /_'di ltar dper na/_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni gzhan la yid ches 
[\[124a.3\]]bas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro zhing chos nyid mngon du gyur pas bdud sdig to can gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa yin/_rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 
[\[124a.4\]]rnams kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thub pa yin te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i chos can yin/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i khams su gnas shing /_
[\[124a.5\]]gzhan gyi dring [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jog pa yin/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yid ches pas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas 
[\[124a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bdud sdig to can la yid ches pas 'gro bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mu stegs can dang /_

[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba 'am tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'du shes sam 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du byed dam/_'du byed kyi de bzhin

[\[127b.7\]]de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/_lam gyi gzugs brnyan gang 'khor bar spyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rnam pas lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston te/_yang na rus par 'du shes pa ston/_yang na bsam gtan dang po ston/_yang 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]na bsam gtan gnyis pa ston/_yang na bsam gtan gsum pa ston/_yang na bsam gtan bzhi pa ston/_yang na byams pa ston/_yang na snying rje ston/_yang na dga' ba ston/_yang na btang snyoms ston/_yang na 
[\[128a.2\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ston/_yang na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ston/_yang na [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched ston/_yang na 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched ston cing /_tshe dang ldan pa lam dang nan tan gang gis/_rgyun 
[\[128a.3\]]tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i lam dang nan tan ni 'di yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa lam dang nan tan 'dis 'di 
[\[128a.4\]]nyid du khyod kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyungs shig dang /_phyin chad 'khor ba na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal de dag myong bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/kye ma khyod kyi lus 'di 'di nyid du mngon par ma grub na/_lus gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su gzung 
[\[128a.5\]]bar sems shes zer yang /_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'khrug [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo zhing gong du yang 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag la lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa ni/_dge slong 'di 
[\[128a.6\]]bdag la phan 'dogs pa ste/_lam gyi gzugs brnyan des ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yang 
[\[128a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_rang byang chub mngon du bya bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon tu bya bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro snyam ste/_de las kyang gong du gang bdag la de 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]ltar chags pa ston pa'i dge slong 'di ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa yin gyis bdag gis chags pa de dag shes par bya ste/_theg pa gsum po kun la bslab par bya'o zhes dga' ba skye la/_bdud sdig to can des kyang byang chub sems 
[\[128b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dga' bar gyur par shes nas/_de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[128b.3\]]gzims cha dang snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad kyis rim gror byas pa dang /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[128b.4\]]su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_bsam 
[\[128b.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te/_ji ltar byang chub sems 
[\[128b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[128b.7\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]spyod pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[129a.2\]]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa 
[\[129a.3\]]dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /_rdzu 
[\[129a.4\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /_stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[129a.5\]]la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[129a.6\]]dgu la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang /_de 
[\[129a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /_byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang /_snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]brgyad la spyod pa dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par bgyi zhes/_byang chub sems 
[\[129b.2\]]dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi don du kun dris shing yongs su zhus pa rnams blta bar 'dod dam/_de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang bshad pa la de bzhin du gnas te/_de bzhin du brtson par byas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[129b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/_de ltar gdams pa dang /_de ltar bstan pa dang /_de ltar gnas pa dang /_de ltar slob slob pa rnams kyis 
[\[129b.4\]]kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/_khyod kyis lta bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur re skan zhes brjod de/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la snying brnyan bcug kyang 
[\[129b.5\]]de'i sems gzhan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur zhing /_gong du dge slong 'di ni de ltar bdag la chags pa gang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang thob par 
[\[129b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_rang byang chub kyang thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob 
[\[129b.7\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'i chags pa ston pa ni/_bdag la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes dga' ba skyes pas/_bdud sdig to can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i sems la zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig nas/_sa'i phyogs de nyid du dge slong 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]mang po mngon par sprul te/_dge slong 'di dag kun kyang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug 'jug pa sha stag ste/_de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par gyur na/_khyod ltas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[130a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur re skan zhes zer yang /_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste/_'di ni bdud sdig to can te/_lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa'o/_/
[\[130a.3\]]zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog cing /_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung la/_de 
[\[130a.4\]]las kyang gong du yang 'di snyam ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[130a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de ltar spyod pa ni/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[130a.6\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ba'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]skabs [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ni gnas ma yin no snyam na/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[130a.7\]]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du gal te de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstan pa de ltar bslabs 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]la spyod pa de dang ma bral zhing pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 'di dag gis spyod pa de ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_bzod pa'i pha

[\[130b.3\]]nyid las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_phyi stong pa nyid las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_chen po stong pa nyid las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid las

[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]yan lag rnams las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_bsam gtan rnams las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[131a.3\]]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams las yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams las yongs

[\[131a.7\]]dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci las slar ldog pa'i slad du phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa zhes bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni gzugs 
[\[131b.2\]]kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/tshor ba'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/'du shes kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/'du byed kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/khams kyi 'du shes las phyir 
[\[131b.3\]]ldog go_/skye mched kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/'dod chags kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/zhe sdang gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/gti mug gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/lta ba'i rnam pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/pha 
[\[131b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/yang dag par spong ba'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i 'du shes las phyir 
[\[131b.5\]]ldog go_/dbang po'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/stobs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/'phags pa'i bden

[\[131b.7\]]phyir ldog go_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/mngon par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go_/ting 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/gzungs kyi sgo'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/so so yang dag 
[\[132a.2\]]par rig pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/byams pa chen po'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/snying rje chen po'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'du 
[\[132a.3\]]shes las phyir ldog go/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/rang byang chub kyi 'du shes las phyir 
[\[132a.4\]]ldog go/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/nyan thos kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/sangs 
[\[132a.5\]]rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste/_des 
[\[132a.6\]]chos rdul tsam yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas mngon par 'du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/mngon par 'du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas skyed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba la bzod pa zhes bya ste/_
[\[132a.7\]]rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_tshul de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]le'u sum cu dgu'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can nye 
[\[132b.2\]]bar 'ong ste/_mos pa bzlog cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o chos 'di dag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_
[\[132b.3\]]rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/de ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[132b.4\]]'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de dag gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_chos 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas 'di lta ste/_bla 
[\[132b.5\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/_khyod nyon mongs la don [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni bdud kyis bstan pa'o/_/'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[132b.6\]]bshad pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu yid la byed pa de dag thong la/_khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma spyod cig_/sdug bsngal dang log par ltung ngo zhes zer na/_de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshig de 
[\[132b.7\]]dag thos nas/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/_de ltar bdag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa de ni bdud kyi las te/_chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]de/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong mod kyi/_de dag sems can rnams kyi ma shes ma mthong khong du ma chud kyis/_de'i phyir bdag gis ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis 
[\[133a.2\]]stong pa'i go cha bgos te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas la/_sems can thams cad la 'byung ba'i chos bstan to/_/sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par 
[\[133a.3\]]bya'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu dgong bar bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/rang byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[133a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed cing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_chos de dag thos na sems brtan par bya'o/_/sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo

[\[134a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni

[\[137a.5\]{]myig [,]mig [}]gi dbang po dang /_rna ba'i dbang po dang /_sna'i dbang po dang /_lce'i dbang po dang /_lus kyi dbang po dang /_yid kyi dbang po dang /_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_
