[\[227b.7\]]pa'i khams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/ma rig pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/'du byed la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_rnam par shes pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_ming dang gzugs la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_skye mched drug la mi spyad/_reg pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_tshor ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_sred pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_len pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]srid pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_skye ba la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_rga shi la mi spyod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[228a.2\]]la mi spyod/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/nang stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_phyi stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/_chen po 
[\[228a.3\]]stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_dor ba med pa 
[\[228a.4\]]stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo 
[\[228a.5\]]bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod/_dbang po rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_stobs rnams la mi spyod/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[228a.6\]]spyod/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod/_bsam gtan rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod/_rnam par 
[\[228a.7\]]thar pa brgyad la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_mngon par shes pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]spyod/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mi spyod/_byams pa chen po la mi spyod/_snying rje chen po la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[228b.2\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_dgra bcom pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_rang byang chub la mi spyod/_lam gyi rnam pa 
[\[228b.3\]]shes pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang /_gang gis spyod pa dang /_gang la spyod par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[228b.4\]]ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thub pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams 
[\[228b.5\]]cad kyis zil gyis gnon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa la gnas pas/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[228b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni zil gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]non pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 
[\[228b.7\]]gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lus thob par gyur te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/_bkur sti byas/_phu dud byas/_mchod pa byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[229a.2\]]ba de yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar 
[\[229a.3\]]gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_
[\[229a.4\]]'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi 
[\[229a.5\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lus thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/_de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du 
[\[229a.6\]]bzhugs pa la/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/_bkur sti byas/_phu dud byas/_mchod pa byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor 
[\[229a.7\]]de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag 
[\[229b.2\]]par ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[229b.3\]]mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/_de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/_bkur sti byas 
[\[229b.4\]]phu dud byas/_mchod pa byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_
[\[229b.5\]]gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_
[\[229b.6\]]rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/_rnam par spyod na de'i bsod 
[\[229b.7\]]nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lus thob par gyur te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/_de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/_bkur sti byas/_phu dud byas/_mchod pa byas te/_dge ba'i 
[\[230a.2\]]rtsa ba de yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/
[\[230a.3\]]bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[230a.4\]]gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/
[\[230a.5\]]rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[230a.6\]]rgyas par gyur la/_de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/_bkur sti byas/_phu dud byas/_mchod pa byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[230a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[230b.2\]]'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems 
[\[230b.3\]]can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_tshad 
[\[230b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[230b.5\]]bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de dge ba'i 
[\[230b.6\]]rtsa ba de yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang 
[\[230b.7\]]ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 
[\[231a.2\]]sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lus thob par gyur la/_de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa 
[\[231a.3\]]dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[231a.4\]]ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod 
[\[231a.5\]]de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_
[\[231a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_
[\[231a.7\]]'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal ta stong gi 'jig 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lus thob par gyur la/_de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la 
[\[231b.2\]]rab tu bkod pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_
[\[231b.3\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[231b.4\]]la rab tu bkod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_
[\[231b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston cing 'chad pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[231b.6\]]gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[231b.7\]]khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lus thob par gyur la/_de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]la rab tu bkod pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab 
[\[232a.2\]]tu bkod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[232a.3\]]chub la rab tu bkod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_
[\[232a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[232a.5\]]gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[232a.6\]]kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lus thob par gyur la/_de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_
[\[232a.7\]]tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]la rab tu bkod pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[232b.2\]]yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/
[\[232b.3\]]bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_rnam par gzhog pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[232b.4\]]gzhog pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams 
[\[232b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_rnam par 'byed pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[232b.6\]]ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni sems can gang la yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byams pa chen po 
[\[232b.7\]]mngon par bsgrub ste/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad gsad par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar lta ste/_de dag snying rje chen po 'thob bo/_/de dag rnam par spyod pa des/_rnam par spyod pas dga' 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]bas rab tu dga' ba dang /_mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/_de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par sgrub bo/_/de dag mtshan ma de dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/_de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub 
[\[233a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[233a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang /_sems can 
[\[233a.4\]]thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go_/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/_su'i gos dang /_bsod snyoms 
[\[233a.5\]]dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang /_sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[233a.6\]]dpa' chen po don yod par khams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod par 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang /_snang ba chen po dbyung bar 'dod pa dang /_khams gsum gyi btson ran gnas pa'i sems can 
[\[233a.7\]]rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]bskyed par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par gnas par bya'o/_/gal te byang 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par mi spyod na yang /_des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go skabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]da bye ste/_des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba 
[\[233b.2\]]nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sngon cad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/_des nor bu rin po che 
[\[233b.3\]]de rnyed pas dga' ba dang spro ba dang yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/_des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na/_de'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po 
[\[233b.4\]]che de dang bral bar gyur to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'o snyam du bsams te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[233b.5\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ste/_de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang /_yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[233b.6\]]yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[233b.7\]]la bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/_bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_yid la bgyi ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te byang chub 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/_
[\[234a.2\]]chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa yin no/_/
[\[234a.3\]]zhes bya bar shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/_rang bzhin gyis stong 
[\[234a.4\]]pa ste/_de la 'phel ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems 
[\[234a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[234a.6\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung yang 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de bzhin nyid la 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba

[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jum mi 'gong /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_ting nge 'dzin rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci 
[\[238a.2\]]lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_so so yang dag par 
[\[238a.3\]]rig pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_snying rje chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[238a.4\]]pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 
[\[238a.5\]]'das ci lags/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_dgra bcom pa nyid/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_
[\[238a.6\]]rang byang chub/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[238a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_

[\[243a.1\]]rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos

[\[243a.3\]]gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_
[\[243a.4\]]chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang /_

[\[247b.7\]]nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid 
[\[248a.2\]]dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog 
[\[248a.3\]]nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos 
[\[248a.4\]]skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_
[\[248a.5\]]rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_
[\[248a.6\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_
[\[248a.7\]]snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid 
[\[248b.2\]]dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab 
[\[248b.3\]]pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa 
[\[248b.4\]]nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam

[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab

[\[249a.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid

[\[251a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid

[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_

[\[252b.3\]]dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_

[\[252b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid 
[\[252b.7\]]dang /_gso ba nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de/_shes rab 
[\[253a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gso ba nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de 
[\[253a.3\]]bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab 
[\[253a.4\]]pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin 
[\[253a.5\]]nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 
[\[253a.6\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor 
[\[253a.7\]]ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de 
[\[253b.2\]]bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab 
[\[253b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gsog nyid dang /_gsob nyid dang /_rag lus pa nyid dang /_snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[253b.4\]]ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[253b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod na/_bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[253b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de 
[\[253b.7\]]khyod kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod 
[\[254a.2\]]dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 
[\[254a.3\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/_rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[254a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/_rab 'byor 'di ni stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes 
[\[254a.5\]]bya ste/_lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod de ltar rtsol/_de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/_ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 
[\[254a.6\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/_de'i chos de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[254a.7\]]tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_chos thams cad kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_skye ba yang ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba 
[\[254b.2\]]yang ma lags pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[254b.3\]]gal te skye ba yang ma lags/_mi skye ba yang ma lags pa las kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na 
[\[254b.4\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta 
[\[254b.5\]]bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par 
[\[254b.6\]]rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes 
[\[254b.7\]]su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/zhes bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems 
[\[255a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'o/_/
[\[255a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u bzhi bcu lnga'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[255a.4\]]tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du blta dka' ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/
[\[255a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[255a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zhi ba phra ba zhib pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang 
[\[255a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang zhing klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin 
[\[255b.2\]]te/_sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang zhing klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[255b.3\]]par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[255b.4\]]thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur/_tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 
[\[255b.5\]]gyur la/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la/_glog cing kun chub par byed par gyur te/_bzung zhing bcangs/_blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /_de bzhin nyid du 
[\[255b.6\]]nan tan byed na/_kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/
[\[255b.7\]]bye ba'i brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs dang cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzod do/_/de nas dge slong gcig cig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/_
[\[256a.2\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yeng ba'i 
[\[256a.3\]]sems kyis 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[256a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis non to/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[256a.5\]]gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/_bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/_tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_de dag thams cad byang 
[\[256a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis non na/_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par 
[\[256a.7\]]byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bzung zhing bcangs te/_blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon par 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 
[\[256b.2\]]'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[256b.3\]]thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang 
[\[256b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[256b.5\]]par yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag 
[\[256b.6\]]kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[256b.7\]]spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro 
[\[257a.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs 
[\[257a.3\]]mkhas pa dang bral ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[257a.4\]]chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[257a.5\]]phyin pa la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa dang mthun par spyod pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]gcad pa'i don du gnas pa'o/_/
[\[257a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed pa'o/_/de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang phang bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[257a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po de ni/_sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o/_/de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste/_nyan thos kyi bslab pa la 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]slob pa ma yin no/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/_/de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te nye bar dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o/_/
[\[257b.2\]]kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig_/skyes bu chen po skyen par slobs shig_/lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 
[\[257b.3\]]blang bar bya ba ste/_'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston to/_/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[257b.4\]]dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dod par sems so/_/de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i rgyal po 
[\[257b.5\]]rab mtshe ma yang /_mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang /_'phrul dga'i lha'i bu 
[\[257b.6\]]rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/_/tshangs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed kyi bdag po yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems 
[\[257b.7\]]so/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]sems so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so/_/gnas 
[\[258a.2\]]gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/_byang chub 
[\[258a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus 
[\[258a.4\]]la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bab ste/_dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/_'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi nad dam/_
[\[258a.5\]]rna ba'i nad dam/_sna'i nad dam/_lce'i nad dam/_lus kyi nad dam/_snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bab ste/_'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 
[\[258a.6\]]mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[258a.7\]]yon tan dang legs pa rjod dam/_'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa rjod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[258b.2\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang /_
[\[258b.3\]]legs pa rjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs so/_/kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[258b.4\]]brtson par byed pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/_gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[258b.5\]]mngon du byas te/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/_'on te ma yin gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[258b.6\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/_dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_bdud sdig to can 
[\[258b.7\]]mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang /_zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar ma ltung bar gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom 
[\[259a.2\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[259a.3\]]dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[259a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ston gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo /_/kun dga' 
[\[259a.5\]]bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/_'on tam ma yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 
[\[259a.6\]]'ong ngo /_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/_des dge ba'i bshes gnyen [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]thos so/_/ma thos pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes so/_/shes rab kyi 
[\[259a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/_dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i 
[\[259b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa rjod na/_de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/_gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/_gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa 
[\[259b.3\]]smra ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas/_bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste/_de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par 
[\[259b.4\]]'gyur ba ni/_de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[259b.5\]]ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/_khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha 
[\[259b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/_bsgoms pa dang /_bzung ba dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/_ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na/_khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na/_kun dga' bo byang 
[\[259b.7\]]chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa skyed cing /_nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]phyin pa la spyad pa'o/_/nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/_/nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/_/nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/_/nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[260a.2\]]phyin pa la spyad pa'o/_/nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/_/khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[260a.3\]]pa ma yin no/_/khyod ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/zhes rlom sems su byed na/_kun 
[\[260a.4\]]dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems skyed na/_kun dga' bo de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /_
[\[260a.5\]]spro ba dang nyams bde ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems 
[\[260a.6\]]dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]brjod pa'am/_rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/_de [{]mying [,]ming [}]brjod pa'am/_rus brjod pa des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag stod gzhan smod la/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[260a.7\]]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang tshul dang /_mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam pa dang tshul dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing bdag stod gzhan smod de/_'di skad du ji 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]snang ngo zhes de de ltar gang zag byang 
[\[260b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par rjod cing smod na/_de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi gnas ni stongs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin 
[\[260b.3\]]rje'i 'jig rten pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/_de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo 
[\[260b.4\]]mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang /_yid ches par bya bar sems te/_de la de dag gis thos sam mthong na/_mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/_de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/_de dag de bzhin du slob 
[\[260b.5\]]pa'i tshe de bzhin nyid du slob cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/_nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/_de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi 
[\[260b.6\]]'dod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa dang yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul yang rab tu 
[\[260b.7\]]'phel bar 'gyur te/_bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/_kun dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas/_bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /_spro ba dang tshim pa dang /_yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/_khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/_de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/_kye rigs kyi bu 'di 
[\[261a.2\]]ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'thab mo dang 'khrug pa dang rtsod pa dang mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[261a.3\]]nyid kyi lam ma yin te/_de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo/_/de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo/_/de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo/_/de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[261a.4\]]kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /_gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la/_'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/_de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/_'di gnyis 
[\[261a.5\]]ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o/_/'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams 
[\[261a.6\]]pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/_rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang /_tshim zhing yid 
[\[261a.7\]]bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/_byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing /_'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/_gal te des rnam 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na/_ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang /_'thab cing rtsod pa dang /_'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal bar go ca bgo bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[261b.2\]]ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan ma mchis sam 'on te ma lags kyis bskal pa de snyed kho nar go ca bgo 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_
[\[261b.3\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/_kun dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /_
[\[261b.4\]]'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]snyan du brjod pa dang /_'thabs rtsod de gshe ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]snyan par brjod pa byas nas/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chags par mdud par 'dzin cing khon tu bzung ste gnas na/_kun dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste/_
[\[261b.5\]]gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]btang zhe na/_gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go ca bgo bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang mi snyan 
[\[261b.6\]]par brjod par gyur na yang /_mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing /_bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bstsal dgos na/_de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba 
[\[261b.7\]]dang /_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/_de ltar bdag gzhan la [{]myi [,]mi [}]snyan par smra zhing /_phyir zlogs pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]tshul gyis/_bdag gis de ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'i bdag gis glen pa dang /_lkug pa bzhin du bya'o/_/
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos 
[\[262a.2\]]na/_de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang /_de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis/_bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o/_/bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/_kun dga' bo byang chub 
[\[262a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/_de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan 
[\[262a.4\]]thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/'dug par mi bya'o/_/gal te 'dug na yang des su la yang gnod sems su mi bya 'khrug par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang bdag gis 
[\[262a.5\]]'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang /_'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]tshul lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_sdug bsngal thams 
[\[262a.6\]]cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/_
[\[262a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/_ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/_de ci'i 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o/_/'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o/_/'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha 
[\[262b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa 
[\[262b.3\]]nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong 
[\[262b.4\]]pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[262b.5\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 
[\[262b.6\]]dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam 
[\[262b.7\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_
[\[263a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o/_/snyam du sems bskyed do/_/des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par byas te/_'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa 
[\[263a.3\]]ste/_gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/_de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[263a.4\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /_ma bral bar gnas na/_bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/snyam du sems bskyed de/_de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no/_/
[\[263a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u bzhi bcu drug go/_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis/_bcom 
[\[263a.6\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[263a.7\]]kyis bka' [{]stsald [,]stsal [}]pa/_rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]nang stong pa nyid ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]phyi stong pa nyid ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]chen 
[\[263b.2\]]po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 
[\[263b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub 
[\[263b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub 
[\[263b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub 
[\[263b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[263b.7\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/rab 'byor dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/_/gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_tshor ba ni tshor bas stong /_
[\[264a.2\]]'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong /_'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis stong /_rna ba ni rna bas stong /_sna ni snas stong /_lce ni lces stong /_lus ni lus kyis stong /_yid ni yid kyis stong /_gzugs ni 
[\[264a.3\]]gzugs kyis stong /_sgra ni sgras stong /_dri ni dris stong /_ro ni ros stong /_reg ni reg gis stong /_chos ni chos kyis stong /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pas stong /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong /_sna'i rnam par 
[\[264a.4\]]shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong /_lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 
[\[264a.5\]]'dus te reg pas stong /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong /_
[\[264a.6\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong /_sna'i 
[\[264a.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]rkyen kyis tshor bas stong /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong /_sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong /_chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyis 
[\[264b.2\]]stong /_rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong /_nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong /_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong /_ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong /_'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong /_
[\[264b.3\]]rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyis stong /_skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong /_reg pa ni reg pas stong /_tshor ba ni tshor bas stong /_sred pa ni sred pas stong /_len pa ni len pas stong /_
[\[264b.4\]]srid pa ni srid pas stong /_skye ba ni skye bas stong /_rga shi ni rga shis stong /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[264b.5\]]pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha 
[\[264b.6\]]rol tu phyin pas stong /_nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /_phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong /_phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /_chen po stong pa nyid ni 
[\[264b.7\]]chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong /_don dam pa stong po nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /_'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong /_mtha' las 'das pa 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[265a.2\]]ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /_
[\[265a.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[265a.4\]]rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong /_yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong /_dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong /_
[\[265a.5\]]stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rnam par

[\[267a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_lce 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_lce [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams

[\[267a.3\]]sam/_lus 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_lus [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_yid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob

[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_sgra 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_sgra mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags

[\[267b.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_reg 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_reg [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_
[\[267b.7\]]chos bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_chos 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_chos 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du 
[\[268a\]]

[\[271b\]]

[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_
[\[272a.2\]{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_skye mched drug

[\[272b\]]

[\[272b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_srid pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_skye ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_skye ba 
[\[272b.7\]]'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_skye ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rga shi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/_rga shi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/_rnam
