[\[293a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam par thar 
[\[293a.7\]]pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_mngon par shes pa rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]du slob pa yin nam/_mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[293b.2\]]du slob pa yin nam/_mngon par shes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_
[\[293b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_ting nge 
[\[293b.4\]]'dzin rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 
[\[293b.5\]]'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[293b.6\]]rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_de bzhin 
[\[293b.7\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_
[\[294a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_
[\[294a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams 
[\[294a.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob 
[\[294a.5\]]na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_snying rje chen po zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa 
[\[294a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bya'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_snying rje chen po 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[294a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_snying rje chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[294b.2\]]slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zad par bya 
[\[294b.3\]]ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[294b.4\]]'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[294b.5\]]bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_
[\[294b.6\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa 
[\[294b.7\]]yin nam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]du slob pa yin nam/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa 
[\[295a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_dgra bcom pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[295a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_dgra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_dgra bcom pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa 
[\[295a.4\]]yin nam/_rang byang chub zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rang byang chub 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rang byang 
[\[295a.5\]]chub 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rang byung chub mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zad par 
[\[295a.6\]]bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa 
[\[295a.7\]]nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin

[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_

[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_

[\[298a.7\]]'gag par 'gyur ram/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de 
[\[298b.2\]]zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[298b.3\]]bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_
[\[298b.4\]]dbang po lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_stobs lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_
[\[298b.5\]]byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 
[\[298b.6\]]'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de 
[\[298b.7\]]zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang 
[\[299a.2\]]pa 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_rnam par thar 
[\[299a.3\]]pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin 
[\[299a.4\]]pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin 
[\[299a.5\]]pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi'i de 
[\[299a.6\]]bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_
[\[299a.7\]]snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]'gag par 'gyur ram/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang 
[\[299b.2\]]pa 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 
[\[299b.3\]]'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de 
[\[299b.4\]]zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[299b.5\]]de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[299b.6\]]nyid la slob pa yin/_de bzhin nyid ni zad pa 'am/_spang ba 'am/_skye ba 'am/_'gag par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 
[\[299b.7\]]slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]phyin pa la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[300a.2\]]chen po ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[300a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[300a.4\]]dpa' chen po ni/_phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_stong 
[\[300a.5\]]pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_don dam pa 
[\[300a.6\]]stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_'dus ma 
[\[300a.7\]]byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_thog ma 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[300b.2\]]po ni/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[300b.3\]]chen po ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[300b.4\]]dpa' chen po ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[300b.5\]]dpa' chen po ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub 
[\[300b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i 
[\[300b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_stobs lnga la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob 
[\[301a.2\]]pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_bsam gtan 
[\[301a.3\]]bzhi la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[301a.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[301a.5\]]ni/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[301a.6\]]la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[301a.7\]]rnams la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_so so yang dag 
[\[301b.2\]]par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[301b.3\]]'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_
[\[301b.4\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[301b.5\]]dpa' chen po ni/_dgra bcom pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_rang byang chub la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[301b.6\]]dpa' chen po ni/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob 
[\[301b.7\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_bdud dam bdud kyi 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_myur du phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang 
[\[302a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_bdag gi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa 
[\[302a.3\]]yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/_rab 
[\[302a.4\]]'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sems can 
[\[302a.5\]]yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[302a.6\]]slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya'o zhes slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 
[\[302a.7\]]rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]gcad pa'i phyir slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]ni/_'dus ma byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o/_/zhes slob pa yin te/_rab 'byor sems can dma' bas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di la bslab par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'dir slob 
[\[302b.2\]]pa de ni/_sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sems can dmyal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/gshin 
[\[302b.3\]]rje'i 'jig rten du [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/yul mtha' 'khob tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/yul gcong rong can du mi skye'o/_/phyag dar pa dang /_gdol ba'i rigs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/zhar bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/sgur por [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/zha bor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/yan 
[\[302b.4\]]lag skyon can du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'on par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/lag pa med par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dbang po dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_dbang po yongs su tshang zhing dbang po ma tshang bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/srog gcod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[302b.5\]]ma byin pa len par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'dod pas log par g.yem par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phra ma can du mi 'gyur ro/_/zhe gcod pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro/_/tshig kyal pa can du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/chags 
[\[302b.6\]]sems can du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/gnod sems can du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/log par lta bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa ma yin pas yongs su 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims ngan pa can du 
[\[302b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_lha tshe rings po'i nang du [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe rings por [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de/_de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las 
[\[303a.2\]]thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/_thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[303a.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[303a.4\]]dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos 
[\[303a.5\]]thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang zhig gi yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de 
[\[303a.6\]]bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[303a.7\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'god pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de ni/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong bas/_
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_
[\[303b.2\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_nang stong pa nyid la spyod/_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod/_
[\[303b.3\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod/_rang 
[\[303b.4\]]bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[303b.5\]]nyid la spyod/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod/_dbang po lnga la spyod/_stobs lnga la spyod/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[303b.6\]]brgyad pa la spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod/_bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la spyod/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[303b.7\]]par 'jug pa dgu la spyod/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod/_mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]stobs bcu la spyod/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la spyod/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod/_snying rje chen po la spyod/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod/_lan 
[\[304a.2\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/_dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod/_rang byang chub la spyod/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod de/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang 
[\[304a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_chos thams cad kyi stobs dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa nyid rab du thob par 'gyur te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[304a.4\]]chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa dang /_g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po'i phyogs gang na 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni 
[\[304a.5\]]nyung ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i sems can de lta bu yang nyung ste/_sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas 
[\[304a.6\]]ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/_sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa 
[\[304a.7\]]de lta bu ni ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang nyung ste/_sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]mang ngo /_/rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan

[\[304b.3\]]mo 'di la spyod cing /_the tsom [{]myed [,]med [}]par phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni/_gang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo /_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa

[\[306b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu

[\[306b.6\]]lta bar lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te/_rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu dus byas par gyur ba'i 'tsho

[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]te/_rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha 
[\[307a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa la slob pa yin na/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni sems 
[\[307a.3\]]can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang mang ba lags na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[307a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]lus 
[\[307a.5\]]thob par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re la yang /_sku tshe'i mthar phyin gyi bar du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[307a.6\]]pos rgyun ma 'chad par na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byas na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod 
[\[307a.7\]]nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chad pa dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub 
[\[307b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_de ltar don chen por 'gyur ba ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[307b.3\]]po/_sems can thams cad kyi bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can mgon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thams cad kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_skyabs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi 
[\[307b.4\]]gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_long ba rnams kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_mun par gnas pa rnams kyi sgron mar 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba 'thob par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud 
[\[307b.5\]]par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par rtse bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i nga ro bsgrag par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnga brdung bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par 'dod pa dang /_
[\[307b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi gtam bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_phun sum tshogs pa gang 
[\[307b.7\]]thob par bya ba de dag las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'thob pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]bgyi ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya/_rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya ste/_de la gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya/_
[\[308a.2\]]'dug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'i/_shes pa dang /_mthong bas de dag mthong bar bya ste/_de las 'da' bar bya/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par chud par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_rnam pa thams 
[\[308a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 
[\[308a.4\]]'jig rten na/_sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_de ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan 
[\[308a.5\]]cing 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin/_rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[308a.6\]]la spyod pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs 
[\[308a.7\]]su [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyam pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ring du byed cing bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin no/_/gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam ste/_gal te de ltar shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myi [,]mi [}]spyod do/_/gal te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[308b.2\]]tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do zhes bya bar shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang /_gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas

[\[308b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod pa yang ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do zhes/_rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[308b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u bzhi bcu bdun no//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[308b.6\]]'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[308b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos

[\[309a.3\]]yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang spyod/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan

[\[309a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la yang spyod/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_

[\[309a.7\]]par gyur na lta ci smos/_sems can gang gi sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa de dag kyang thob pa legs par thob cing /_de dag gi 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho ba yin na/_gang gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]bskyed pa dag lta ci smos/_sems can gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa de dag ni/_kun gyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no snyam nas/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_me tog 
[\[309b.2\]]man+dA ra ba mang po blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/_me tog man+dA ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/rab tu gtor to/_/de 
[\[309b.3\]]ltar gtor te mngon par gtor ba dang /_rab tu gtor bar byas nas/_tshig 'di skad du brjod do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[309b.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/rang byung gi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams

[\[309b.6\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar log ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyi/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos 
[\[309b.7\]]pa skyed cing /_yang dang yang du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don du mos/_
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]sman par mos/_bde bar mos shing /_legs par bgyi bar mos te/_sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste/_ci bdag rgal nas sems 
[\[310a.2\]]can ma rgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram/_ci bdag grol nas sems can ma grol ba 'grol bar 'gyur ram/_ci bdag dbugs phyin nas/_sems can dbugs ma byung ba dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ram/_ci bdag yongs su mya ngan 
[\[310a.3\]]las 'das nas/_sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa/_yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ram zhes rtog par bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[310a.4\]]rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /_yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang

[\[310a.6\]]bar bgyid na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka gling chen po 
[\[310a.7\]]bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/_skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/_de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/_de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid

[\[310b.3\]]rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de ni/_skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i cha gcig 
[\[310b.4\]]gis chu'i thigs pa blang ba'i tshad gyis/_tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/_de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan

[\[310b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni/_bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom 
[\[310b.7\]]ldan 'das gang gis sems bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa ste/_gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems

[\[311a.1\]]bskyed pa'i sems de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba ste/_gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang /_chos yongs su ma btang ba dang /_dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag la

[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang /_spyod

[\[311b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa yin te/_de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su mya ngan las

[\[311b.7\]]brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_
[\[312a.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgyu ma yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[312a.3\]]'byor de ci snyam du sems/_de ltar sgyu ma yang ma mthong /_sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyang ma mthong na/_sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_
[\[312a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang yang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[312a.5\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na/_chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[312a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_mchis pa 'am ma mchis pa'i chos gang zhig bdag 
[\[312a.7\]]gis bstan par bgyi/_chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni mchis pa 'am ma mchis par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_ma mchis pa'i chos kyang 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing /_
[\[312b.2\]]yongs su ma mchis pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu 
[\[312b.3\]]dben pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu 
[\[312b.4\]]dben pa'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/
[\[312b.5\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rang bzhin stong 
[\[312b.6\]]pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu 
[\[312b.7\]]dben pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu dben 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dbang po rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/stobs rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[313a.2\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[313a.3\]]pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon 
[\[313a.4\]]pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu dben 
[\[313a.5\]]pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/byams pa chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/snying rje chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/
[\[313a.6\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rang byang chub ni shin tu 
[\[313a.7\]]dben pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bsgom par bgyi ba yang ma lags/_rnam par bsgom par bgyi ba yang ma 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]lags te/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i slad du chos gang yang bsgrub pa ma mchis so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa lags na/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtan cing /_byang chub 
[\[313b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa lags na/_ji ltar dben pas 
[\[313b.3\]]dben pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/bsam 
[\[313b.4\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[313b.5\]]tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu 
[\[313b.6\]]dben pa'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma 
[\[313b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]dben pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben 
[\[314a.2\]]pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/dbang po rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/stobs rnams ni shin 
[\[314a.3\]]tu dben pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/tshad 
[\[314a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/
[\[314a.5\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/
[\[314a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/byams pa chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/snying rje chen po ni shin tu dben 
[\[314a.7\]]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rang byang chub ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[314b.2\]]phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu 
[\[314b.3\]]dben pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_
[\[314b.4\]]chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_
[\[314b.5\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 
[\[314b.6\]]nyid shin tu dben pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_
[\[314b.7\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_dbang po rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_stobs rnams shin tu dben pa 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams shin tu 
[\[315a.2\]]dben pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[315a.3\]]shin tu dben pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa shin tu dben pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_
[\[315a.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shin tu dben pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi shin tu dben pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shin tu dben pa dang /_byams pa chen po 
[\[315a.5\]]shin tu dben pa dang /_snying rje chen po shin tu dben pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad shin tu dben pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa 
[\[315a.6\]]dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu 
[\[315a.7\]]dben pa de bzhin tu/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang shin tu dben pa'o/_/rab 'byor gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/_bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/_sbyin pa'i 
[\[315b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/_nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_chen 
[\[315b.3\]]po stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[315b.4\]]shin tu dben par ma gyur/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben 
[\[315b.5\]]par ma gyur/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_dngos 
[\[315b.6\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_dbang po 
[\[315b.7\]]rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_stobs rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]shin tu dben par ma gyur/_bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_rnam par thar 
[\[316a.2\]]pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/_mngon par 
[\[316a.3\]]shes pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams shin tu 
[\[316a.4\]]dben par ma gyur/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/_byams pa chen po shin tu dben par ma gyur/_snying rje chen po shin tu dben par ma gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad shin tu dben 
[\[316a.5\]]par ma gyur/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur/_dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_
[\[316a.6\]]rang byang chub shin tu dben par ma gyur/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur na/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de bas ma gtan gyi pha 
[\[316a.7\]]rol tu phyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]de nang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de phyi stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de phyi nang stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/de chen po stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de don dam pa stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[316b.2\]]de 'dus byas stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/de thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid du 
[\[316b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de rang bzhin stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de chos thams cad stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/de dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[316b.4\]]stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de yang dag par spong ba rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[316b.5\]]de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de dbang po rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de stobs rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[316b.6\]]de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de bsam gtan rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de rnam par thar pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[316b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de mngon par 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]shes pa rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ting nge 'dzin rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de gzungs kyi sgo rnams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 
[\[317a.2\]]pa bzhir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de byams pa chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de snying rje chen por [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[317a.3\]]pa'i 'bras bur [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bur [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de dgra bcom pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de rang byang chub tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de lam gyi rnam pa shes 
[\[317a.4\]]pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bas na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar 
[\[317a.5\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa 
[\[317a.6\]]dang /_ji ltar nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben 
[\[317a.7\]]pa dang /_ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar rang 
[\[317b.2\]]gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo 
[\[317b.3\]]bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar dbang po rnams shin tu 
[\[317b.4\]]dben pa dang /_ji ltar stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin 
[\[317b.5\]]tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin 
[\[317b.6\]]tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar mngon par 
[\[317b.7\]]shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar byams pa chen po shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar snying rje chen po shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[318a.2\]]ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar 
[\[318a.3\]]dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /_ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[318a.4\]]tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya/_dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ste/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[318a.5\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya bas na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab 
[\[318a.6\]]mo la spyod pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[318a.7\]]chen po de ltar don zab mo la spyod cing /_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gyur ba'i don de mngon du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis/_
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]gsungs pa'i don/_bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_dka' ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa lags/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang 
[\[318b.2\]]mngon tu bgyi ba'i don de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]gang gis mngon tu bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gang mngon tu bgyi ba'i chos de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gang mngon tu bgyis 
[\[318b.3\]]pas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon tu bgyi ba de lta bu yang gang zhig mchis/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gang zhig gis mngon tu bgyi/_
[\[318b.4\]]chos mngon tu bgyi ba de lta bu yang gang zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i spyod pa ste/_de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob pa'o/_/bcom 
[\[318b.5\]]ldan 'das gal te de skad du bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jum yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jum zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngang skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[318b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/_de ni spyod do zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[318b.7\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bgyi bar yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nyan 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni bsring bar bya ste/_bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur to snyam yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni 'di ltar bdag ni la la dang ni ring ngo /_/
[\[319a.2\]]la la dang ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la bye brag ma mchis shing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba dang /_rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/_byang chub sems 
[\[319a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang /_'di ltar bdag las nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring gi bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[319a.4\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di ltar bdag las sgyu ma ni ring ngo /_/sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni nye'o/_/skye bo'i tshogs 'di 
[\[319a.5\]]ltar 'dus pa ni bdag las ring ngo zhe 'am/_nye'o zhes bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[319a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang /_'di ltar bdag las nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo /_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/
[\[319a.7\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_gzugs brnyan ni 'di ltar bdag las [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa gang gis gzugs brnyan byung ba de ni nye/_
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]gang me long dang snod chus gang ba'i nang du byung ba de ni bdag las ring ngo zhes bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[319b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo /_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/
[\[319b.3\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sdug pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang 
[\[319b.4\]]gis 'di la sdug pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni sdug pa 'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug par 'gyur ba 
[\[319b.5\]]gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang sdug pa'am [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[319b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa ste/_
[\[319b.7\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni 'di ltar nga las nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]ni ring ngo /_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dgongs so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog 
[\[320a.2\]]pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang /_'di ltar bdag las nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo /_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[320a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin 
[\[320a.4\]]gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul pa mdzad na/_de ni don gang gi slad du sprul pa de'i don sbyor te/_sprul pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog rnam par mi rtog go_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang /_don gang gi slad du brjod 
[\[320a.5\]]pa'i don de yang bgyid de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_shing mkhan nam/_shing mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bud med kyi gzugs sam/_skyes 
[\[320a.6\]]pa'i gzugs sam/_glang po'i gzugs sam/_chibs rta'i gzugs sam/_glang gi gzugs kyi 'khrul 'khor zhig sbyar na/_de don gang gi slad du bgyis pa'i don de sgrub kyang 'khrul 'khor de ni rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go/_/bcom 
[\[320a.7\]]ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de bgyid kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' shig rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_'on te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin/_'on te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

[\[320b.3\]]yin/_rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam par

[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]pa yin nam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/_sna'i rnam par shes pa yang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_lce'i rnam par

[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]nam/_'du byed kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_rnam par shes pa yang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_skye mched drug kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_reg pa yang rnam par

[\[321b.5\]]stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/_phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[321b.6\]]kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_mtha'

[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]rtog pa yin nam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_

[\[322b.1\]]rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_snying rje chen po yang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yin nam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i

[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]phung po'i gzhi can rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yongs su bzung zhing sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha dang mi'i 'gro ba mngon par sgrub bo/_/tshe

[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni snying po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
